title: [English]  The bill has not been withdrawn

replies.msg:
The bill has not been withdrawn the way it should have been.

https://www.legco.gov.hk/general/english/procedur/content/partk.htm#64
64. Withdrawal or Postponement of Bills

(1) The Member or public officer in charge of a bill may, by an announcement made in Council at the beginning of proceedings for its second or third reading, withdraw or postpone the bill. (L.N. 74 of 2005)

(2) The Member or public officer in charge of a bill may, by an announcement made in Council at the beginning of proceedings for the resumption of the second reading debate on the bill, withdraw the bill if -

(a) the purpose of the resumption is for making such an announcement; and

(b) such purpose has been so stated in the notice of the resumption of debate given under Rule 54(5) (Second Reading).
(L.N. 74 of 2005)

(3) The Member or public officer in charge of a bill may, in making an announcement for the withdrawal of the bill under subrule (2), address the Council on matters relevant to the withdrawal but no debate may arise on such an address. (L.N. 74 of 2005)

It's announcement to be made. No a motion!

Do you hear the people sing 5 demands, not 1 less?
https://lih.kg/1540653
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

撤LLM 對準政權




得到黨媒認證


#Chinazi旗係一個符號，不斷向世界輸出反共思想！

#Chinazi 赤納粹
Chinazi就係China+Nazi。
赤=共產紅色恐怖, 納粹不解釋。


全民反共 對準政權！
黑警、黨鐵，港共全部都係人民既敵人
而背後一直有一個終極大Boss中共

呢一刻中共絕對係十個煲得兩個蓋，準備爆煲。
今日唔號召世界圍堵中共，更待何時？


用#Chinazi黎connect全世界

1. Connect所有黃絲。
殘酷既現實係，並唔係所有黃絲都支持勇武。但黃絲最驚就係共產黨打到黎，一於用反共connect呢班淺黃!

2. Connect部分中立/藍絲。
中立/藍絲既上一輩，全部都係親身經歷過六四既年代，唔少甚至係大陸生活過。係大陸生活上所面對既不公義、中共點砌人生豬肉、佢地可能比我地感受更深。佢地唔會否認對共產黨既恐懼！一齊黎喚醒佢地對中共既不信任！

3. Connect全世界
Nazi既惡行到今時今日都依然係全世界既傷口，但佢地未必注意到係21世紀有個同Nazi不遑多讓既Chinazi！用#chinazi旗加海量文宣，話比佢地知我地既共同敵人係中共！


目標：全香港市民都知到呢個符號！
請大家用各種創意方法令大家知道呢道Chinazi旗！
記住！存在即勝利！


雙手奉上

【Long Battle】The Easiest and most Effective way to fight against Chinazi
- Shared from LIHKG

It is still not yet revoked!!! It could be fake.
Five demands, not one less!

6月9撤回同9月4撤回分別係邊呀?

分別在於:
3隻眼
2次地鐵恐襲
2人被刀手斬至重傷
8人離世
超過100人被檢控
超過1000人被捕
受傷, 逃亡不計其數

淨係計以上的分別, 已經好明顯。
還有整個警隊及制度的不公義已暴露。

五大訴求，缺一不可！
光復香港，時代革命！
唔好再講條bill啦好心，直接講五大訴求
